title: DirectX?
body: So today *Cough* Last night However you wanna look at it. I started getting a Direct X needs to be updated or update your graphics driver message after my champ select. Lets just say I have a 7000$ rig with the Dual 1080's, with everything i mean the latest everything from storage devices to the cooling unit. I did some researching saying to delete certain files and repair but the error keeps returning Im going to ask the forum before I even bother wasting my time with support. GUYS HELP ME OUT.

replies.body: Are you using an AMD graphics card, and was it recently updated?  What happens if you roll it back, then try again in a custom?  Let me know!

Rid yourself of the pests which harass your gameplay by using the [Bug & Crash Exterminator.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Kha’Zix and Elise won’t know what hit ‘em.

Ensure to perform step 3 in the link provided. 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/khazix_deathblossom_splash_1920x1080.jpg?itok=re5tY9ln https://static.lolwallpapers.net/2014/12/Death-Blossom-Elise.jpg
